advertisements.title: Cozy Apartment Tbilisi 37
advertisements.description:
About this space
The apartment is located in the old Tbilisi, tourist area. One out of four bedrooms have a balcony that overlooks one of the most popular tourist destinations in the city - 'Neu Tiflis' (The recovered old district of Tbilisi, which was built by German colonizers two hundred years ago).

The street is closed for traffic and it is a quiet place. Great to take a walk and appreciate the two-century-old architecture. There are many calm cafes and hookah bars nearby.
The space
apartment is located in the heart of the tourist area of Tbilisi
Guest access
Guests can access 112 sq.m. area of the apartment which includes: 4 bedrooms, 2 toilet/bathrooms, kitchen, living room and balcony.

advertisements.title: Entire rental unit in Warsaw, Poland
advertisements.description:
About this space
Location; Chmielna, metro stop "centrum", Galeria Centrum
Apartment in the heart of the city on Chmielna Street by the Atlantic cinema, overlooking PKiN and Wiecha.
The space
Apartment in the heart of the city at ul. Chmielna by the Atlantic cinema, view of PKiN and Wiecha passageway, which is intimate along the whole length with lots of interesting cafes and restaurants
The apartment consists of a room with access to the terrace , kitchen and bathroom. Furnished kitchen, household appliances, table with two chairs. The bathroom has a comfortable shower, toilet, and sink. The living room has a 140x200 bed, a dresser, and a bedside table. The apartment has a TV and free WIFI.
Guest access
Equipment :
double bed , TV, cable TV, wifi, table, chairs, lamp, wardrobe, dresser, vacuum cleaner, clean linens, ironing board, iron

Bathroom comforts
toilet, sink, washing machine, comfortable shower, cabinet, cleaning products, clean towels

Kitchen equipment
electric hob, sink, electric kettle, fridge, set of dishes, cutlery, combination hood, coffee, tea.

Parking
the apartment is located in a paid parking zone. After 18:00 and free parking on weekends.
.

advertisements.title: Room in Warsaw, Poland
advertisements.description:
About this place
This room is well-furnished, and located in good location. It is very easy to reach the Old Town by bus or tram (around 30minutes).

advertisements.title: Private room in rental unit in Paris, France
advertisements.description:
About this space
Bright and quiet private room (that you can lock with key) in our apartment.

Inside your room: open bathtub and WC.

12m2 - A former attic w/ skylight, partly low ceiling, so may not be suitable if you are tall.

4th floor - No lift - Narrow staircase.

Just a few minutes walk to Louvre museum/ Palais Royal Gardens/ Tuileries/Pont des Arts.

Neighbourhood is safe, central and lively.

Very convenient, ave de l'Opéra, with many public transportations: metros + buses.
Roissy bus to CDG airport.
The space
Please take your time to fully read the descriptions.

The room is small 12m2. Quiet and Bright w/ Skylight.

Guests tell us they love our convenient neighbourhood, and the calm/quiet bright space.

But not having a lift and with narrow staircase and partly low ceilings are not for everyone.

Your own private room that you can lock with key.

Inside the room, you have:

- Open Bathtub
- WC
- Desk and chair
- Single bed (90 x 190 cm)
- Refrigerator
- Hot water kettle
- Toaster
- Plate/knife/fork/spoon/cup
- Hair dryer

- Fresh towels, blanket and bedding will be provided.

We only share the entrance.
We stay in the other side of the apartment.
Guest access
We only share the entrance of the apartment. No access to the kitchen.
We live in the other side of the flat.

You will have 3 keys :
1. To open the building door
2. To lock your room
3. Our apartment front door
Other things to note
No over night guest.
No smoking in the room.

Please be independent and non-smoker.

Thank you :)

advertisements.title: Room in Greater London, United Kingdom
advertisements.description:
About this place
Warm and cosy private room with double bed! Enjoy a stay at this spacious and centrally located flat on a quiet road within walking distance to Oval (Northern Line) and Stockwell (Northern & Victoria Lines) tube stations.

The space includes a living room, bathroom, separate toilet, balcony and an equipped kitchen.

Extremely quiet in a very beautiful tree line street. I do provide all the essentials for a pleasant stay.

1 minute's walk from the Van Gogh House!
The space
You will have a large private bedroom with a double-size mattress. Double-glazed windows, TV, reserved space in the wardrobe and a chest of drawers.

The flat has a shared bathroom with a separate toilet, a nice rain shower with great pressure and hot water.

If you wish to cook a quick meal, you will find the kitchen equipped with numerous appliances (including a kettle and an espresso machine).

Good news! Since I am also a professional masseur, you can also book one-hour full-body massage for £80. Reservations must be arranged prior to arrival subject to availability
Guest access
Guests will have access to the entire property, with the exception of the host's bedroom.
The flat is located on the second and top floor of a building. There is no lift.
Other things to note
Perfect private room for business travellers or for a weekend in the city!
